page.title: 05GOVERNMENT IN M.W./SHIPT.
page.content: The area contains part of the parishes of Market Weighton and of Shiptonthorpe. The local government body for Market Weighton is a Town Council of l3 members, headed by the Town Mayor. For Shiptonthorpe it is a Parish Council of 7 members under a Chairman - these Local Councils are responsible for burials, some playing fields and street lighting. In Market Weighton there are 4 schools, 2 resident policemen, a highway maintenance depot, a public library and a fire station controlled by Humberside County Council. The East Yorkshire Borough Council, with H.Q. at Bridlington, is responsible for public sector housing and planning control. Two elected councillors serve Market Weighton and adjacent parishes.
